alert.note: Alert for Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:20PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Pima, southwestern Graham and northwestern Cochise Counties through 700 PM MST... At 619 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cascabel or 24 miles north of Benson, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and very heavy rainfall rates along and near the San Pedro River. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Redington and Cascabel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
